subject: Management
title: Black Swan Awareness
description: A short lesson to help you apply Black Swan Awareness.

hook.text: Nobody modeled a global pandemic shutting down every office simultaneously. Then it happened.

buildup.text: Nassim Taleb's black swans are rare, high-impact events that models ignore.

discovery.text: You can't predict black swans. But you can build systems that survive them.

twist.text: Fragile systems optimize for efficiency. Resilient systems optimize for survival.

climax.text: Keep reserves, diversify dependencies, and stress-test your plans against extremes.

punchline.text: Plan for the probable. Build to survive the impossible.

quiz.question: How should organizations prepare for black swan events?
options: Build resilient systems that can survive extreme shocks
Create detailed predictions for every possible scenario
Focus entirely on the most likely outcomes
